about_the_game:
The Lumberjack's Dynasty - Digital Supporter Pack includes various digital goodies and exclusive content, such as the comprehensive "Getting Started Guide", wallpapers, six Ponsse feature videos, the original soundtrack and a detailed world map.

Original Lumberjack's Dynasty soundtrack
Atmospheric sounds to get you in the right mood for your trip to the woods!

Digital world map
The whole world at a glance - the digital world map gives you an overview of the game's large, beautifully designed world and helps you to find your way around in the game. Find the most important locations, people and tasks by simply glancing at the map!

4K wallpapers
A large variety of exclusive backgrounds bring atmospheric landscapes, forests and powerful machines to your screen.

Getting Started Guide
Explanations, help and useful tips & tricks - the Getting Started Guide answers many questions, gives you an overview of the possibilities that Lumberjack's Dynasty has to offer and makes it easier for you to get started!

Ponsse feature videos
Powerful machines live in action - the Ponsse videos show you BISON, COBRA and SCORPION at work in the forest! You dream of controlling one of the machines - here you can see how it works in real life.

Access to digital goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game's Steam installation directory in the folder "Digital Supporter Pack Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Lumberjacks Dynasty) after fully downloading the Digital Supporter Pack DLC pack.

name: Lumberjack's Dynasty - Digital Supporter Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Lumberjack's Dynasty - Digital Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo / AMD X2, min. 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, min. 1.5GB dedicated VRAM (AMD Radeon HD 7000 series / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 500 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD X4, min. 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, min. 2GB dedicated VRAM (AMD R9 300 series / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 900 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The Lumberjack's Dynasty - Digital Supporter Pack includes various digital goodies and exclusive content, such as the comprehensive "Getting Started Guide", wallpapers, six Ponsse feature videos, the original soundtrack and a detailed world map.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Dutch, Polish
*languages with full audio support
